Player History
Released by St. Louis on 4/25/1965...
Drafted in 2nd round, 31st overall pick, by Cleveland in 1966...
Injured on 7/1/1966 with a Broken Finger, out for 5-6 weeks...
Earned first career win on 5/1/1968...
Traded from Cleveland to Baltimore on 2/6/1971 (Going to CLE: P J. Lehew. Going to BAL: P K. Brett)...
Injured on 9/20/1977 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/13/1980 with a Strained Bicep Tendon, out for 3-4 weeks...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
